actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the withholding of tax on interest and dividends and to increase the penalty for failing to supply taxpayer identification numbers on returns and statements.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the withholding of tax on interest and dividends. Increases the penalty for failing to supply taxpayer identification numbers on returns and statements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to repeal the withholding of tax on interest and dividends and to increase the penalty for failing to supply taxpayer identification numbers on returns and statements.
